cloud.description: Azure Cloud to authenticate against, used with Service Principal authentication

connection_string.description: Azure Blob Storage connection key, which can be found in the Azure Blob Storage resource on the Azure Portal. (no default)

event_hub.description: Configurations of Azure Event Hub triggering on the `Blob Create` event

endpoint.description: Azure Event Hub endpoint triggering on the `Blob Create` event

container_name.description: Name of the blob container with the logs (default = "logs")

service_principal.description: Configuration for the Service Principal credentials

client_id.description: Client ID, used with Service Principal authentication

client_secret.description: Client secret, used with Service Principal authentication

tenant_id.description: Tenant ID, used with Service Principal authentication

storage_account_url.description: Storage Account URL, used with Service Principal authentication

container_name.description: Name of the blob container with the traces (default = "traces")
